delhi.name: Red Fort
delhi.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, Red Fort is an iconic Mughal-era fort known for its stunning architecture and historical significance. It served as the main residence of Mughal emperors for nearly 200 years.
delhi.address: Netaji Subhash Marg, Lal Qila, Chandni Chowk, Delhi, 110006

delhi.name: Qutub Minar
delhi.description: Qutub Minar, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is the tallest brick minaret in the world. It showcases beautiful Islamic architecture and stands amidst several ancient ruins, making it a fascinating historical site.

delhi.name: India Gate
delhi.description: India Gate is a prominent war memorial dedicated to the Indian soldiers who lost their lives during World War I. The majestic arch and well-maintained lawns make it a popular spot for picnics and evening strolls.
delhi.address: Rajpath, India Gate, New Delhi, Delhi, 110001

delhi.name: Lotus Temple
delhi.description: The Lotus Temple, with its awe-inspiring lotus-shaped design, is a Bahá'í House of Worship. This serene place offers a tranquil atmosphere for meditation and prayer, open to people of all faiths.
delhi.address: Lotus Temple Rd, Bahapur, Shambhu Dayal Bagh, Kalkaji, New Delhi, Delhi, 110019

delhi.name: Humayun's Tomb
delhi.description: Humayun's Tomb is a magnificent Mughal mausoleum, considered a precursor to the Taj Mahal. Its stunning architecture and well-maintained gardens make it a must-visit for history and architecture enthusiasts.
delhi.address: Mathura Road, Opposite, Hazrat Nizamuddin Aulia Dargah, Nizamuddin, New Delhi, Delhi, 110013

jammu & kashmir.name: Dal Lake
jammu & kashmir.description: Dal Lake is a picturesque water body surrounded by stunning landscapes and floating gardens. Visitors can enjoy a Shikara ride, houseboat stay, and explore the Mughal gardens on its banks.
jammu & kashmir.address: Dal Lake, Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir, 190001

jammu & kashmir.name: Gulmarg
jammu & kashmir.description: Gulmarg is a breathtaking hill station known for its scenic beauty and adventure sports. It offers skiing in winter, and in summer, visitors can enjoy cable car rides and trekking.

jammu & kashmir.name: Vaishno Devi Temple
jammu & kashmir.description: Vaishno Devi Temple, nestled amidst the Trikuta Mountains, is a revered Hindu pilgrimage site. Devotees undertake a trek to seek blessings of the mother goddess Vaishno Devi.

jammu & kashmir.name: Pangong Lake
jammu & kashmir.description: Pangong Lake, a high-altitude lake, mesmerizes with its ever-changing hues. It stretches between India and Tibet (China), offering a stunning landscape that attracts travelers and photographers alike.
jammu & kashmir.address: Pangong Lake, Leh, Ladakh, Jammu and Kashmir, 194101

jammu & kashmir.name: Betaab Valley
jammu & kashmir.description: Betaab Valley is a scenic paradise named after the Bollywood movie 'Betaab' shot here. It enchants visitors with lush greenery, gushing streams, and a tranquil ambiance, perfect for nature lovers.
jammu & kashmir.address: Betaab Valley Road, Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir, 192126

shimla.name: The Ridge, Shimla
shimla.description: The Ridge is Shimla's central hub, offering stunning views of the surrounding mountains. It's a popular spot for leisurely strolls, shopping, and enjoying various cultural events and festivities.
shimla.address: The Ridge, Lakkar Bazar, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh, 171001

shimla.name: Mall Road, Shimla
shimla.description: Mall Road is a bustling street lined with shops, restaurants, and cafes. It's perfect for shopping, sampling local cuisine, and taking in the lively atmosphere of Shimla's main commercial area.
shimla.address: Mall Road, Near Tourism Lift, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh, 171001

shimla.name: Kufri
shimla.description: Kufri, a picturesque hill station near Shimla, offers panoramic views and exciting activities like skiing in winter and horse riding during other seasons. It's a delightful retreat for nature enthusiasts.

shimla.name: Jakhoo Hill
shimla.description: Jakhoo Hill is famous for the Hanuman Temple, housing a giant Hanuman statue. The hilltop location offers stunning views of Shimla, making it a popular pilgrimage and sightseeing spot.

shimla.name: Summer Hill
shimla.description: Summer Hill, amidst serene surroundings, is where Mahatma Gandhi once stayed. The tranquil ambiance and pleasant weather make it an ideal place for peaceful walks and rejuvenation.

manali.name: Rohtang Pass
manali.description: Rohtang Pass is a high mountain pass offering breathtaking views of snow-capped peaks. It's a gateway to Lahaul-Spiti and a popular spot for snow activities during winter.

manali.name: Solang Valley
manali.description: Solang Valley is a picturesque destination known for its ski slopes and adventure activities like paragliding and zorbing. It's a paradise for thrill-seekers and nature lovers alike.

manali.name: Hadimba Devi Temple
manali.description: Hadimba Devi Temple is an ancient wooden temple dedicated to the goddess Hadimba. Its unique architecture amidst cedar forests adds to the spiritual and aesthetic experience.
manali.address: Hadimba Temple Road, Old Manali, Manali, Himachal Pradesh, 175131

manali.name: Beas River
manali.description: The Beas River flows through Manali, offering serene riverbanks for picnics and nature walks. The gushing river and scenic landscapes provide a peaceful escape from city life.

manali.name: Old Manali
manali.description: Old Manali exudes charm with its narrow lanes, traditional houses, and vibrant cafes. It's a haven for backpackers and travelers seeking a laid-back and bohemian atmosphere.

chandigarh.name: Rock Garden
chandigarh.description: Rock Garden is a unique sculpture garden built from recycled materials. Created by artist Nek Chand, it features a maze of artwork, waterfalls, and beautiful sculptures, making it a creative wonder.

chandigarh.name: Sukhna Lake
chandigarh.description: Sukhna Lake is a serene reservoir where visitors can enjoy boating, walking, and breathtaking sunsets. The picturesque surroundings and migratory birds make it a favorite spot for nature enthusiasts.

chandigarh.name: Rose Garden
chandigarh.description: Zakir Hussain Rose Garden is Asia's largest rose garden, showcasing a stunning array of roses and various other flowers. It's a vibrant paradise for flower lovers and photography enthusiasts.

chandigarh.name: Chandigarh Capitol Complex
chandigarh.description: Chandigarh Capitol Complex is a UNESCO World Heritage Site designed by Le Corbusier. It houses the High Court, Secretariat, and Legislative Assembly, showcasing modernist architecture and urban planning.

chandigarh.name: Leisure Valley
chandigarh.description: Leisure Valley is a series of connected gardens that offer green spaces, walking paths, and entertainment zones. It's an ideal place for family outings and recreational activities.

jaipur.name: Amber Fort
jaipur.description: Amber Fort is a magnificent UNESCO World Heritage Site, featuring Rajput and Mughal architecture. The grandeur of its palaces, courtyards, and intricate designs make it a must-visit historical attraction.

jaipur.name: Hawa Mahal
jaipur.description: Hawa Mahal, the 'Palace of Winds,' is an iconic pink sandstone structure with intricate lattice windows. It was built for royal women to observe street festivals discreetly.
jaipur.address: Hawa Mahal Road, Badi Choupad, J.D.A. Market, Pink City, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302002

jaipur.name: City Palace
jaipur.description: City Palace, a historic landmark, showcases a blend of Rajasthani and Mughal architecture. The palace complex houses museums, courtyards, and gardens, offering insights into Jaipur's royal heritage.
jaipur.address: Tulsi Marg, Gangori Bazaar, J.D.A. Market, Pink City, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302002

jaipur.name: Jantar Mantar
jaipur.description: Jantar Mantar is an astronomical observatory built by Maharaja Jai Singh II. It houses impressive, ancient instruments for tracking celestial movements and predicting astronomical events.
jaipur.address: Tripolia Bazar, Gangori Bazaar, J.D.A. Market, Pink City, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302002

jaipur.name: Nahargarh Fort
jaipur.description: Nahargarh Fort, perched on a hill, offers panoramic views of Jaipur's landscape. With its historical significance and picturesque surroundings, it's a popular spot for tourists and locals alike.
jaipur.address: Nahar Garh Road, Krishna Nagar, Brahampuri, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302002

lucknow.name: Bara Imambara
lucknow.description: Bara Imambara is a grand Mughal-era monument with a labyrinthine network of passages. The central hall has the largest unsupported arched roof in the world, making it a marvel of architecture.
lucknow.address: Rumi Darwaza Road, Machchhi Bhavan, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, 226003

lucknow.name: Chota Imambara
lucknow.description: Chota Imambara, also known as the 'Husainabad Imambara,' is a beautiful mosque known for its intricate decorations and a grand chandelier made of Belgian crystals.

lucknow.name: Rumi Darwaza
lucknow.description: Rumi Darwaza is an imposing 18th-century gateway inspired by ancient Roman architecture. It stands as a symbolic entrance to the city of Lucknow and is an important historical landmark.
lucknow.address: Rumi Darwaza Road, Rumi Darwaza, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, 226003

lucknow.name: Hazratganj
lucknow.description: Hazratganj is a bustling shopping and cultural district in Lucknow. It offers a mix of modern shopping malls, traditional bazaars, and historical monuments, making it a vibrant urban center.

lucknow.name: Ambedkar Memorial Park
lucknow.description: Ambedkar Memorial Park is a massive park and memorial dedicated to Dr. B.R. Ambedkar, the architect of the Indian Constitution. The park features impressive statues and beautiful gardens.

banaras.name: Kashi Vishwanath Temple
banaras.description: Kashi Vishwanath Temple, a sacred Hindu shrine, is dedicated to Lord Shiva. It is one of the most revered temples in India and holds immense religious significance for devotees.
banaras.address: Kashi Vishwanath Temple, Lahori Tola, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, 221001

banaras.name: Dashashwamedh Ghat
banaras.description: Dashashwamedh Ghat is a vibrant and ancient ghat located on the banks of the River Ganges. It is famous for its grand Ganga Aarti ceremony performed every evening.
banaras.address: Dashashwamedh Ghat Road, Ghats of Varanasi, Godowlia, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, 221001

mumbai.name: Gateway of India
mumbai.description: The Gateway of India is an iconic monument overlooking the Arabian Sea. Built during the British Raj, it serves as a symbol of India's maritime history and architectural grandeur.

mumbai.name: Marine Drive
mumbai.description: Marine Drive is a picturesque promenade along the coastline of South Mumbai. Known as the 'Queen's Necklace,' it offers stunning views of the sea and a vibrant atmosphere at sunset.
mumbai.address: Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Road, Marine Drive, Mumbai, Maharashtra, 400021

goa.name: Baga Beach
goa.description: Baga Beach is a popular and lively destination in Goa known for its golden sandy shores and vibrant nightlife. It offers water sports, beach shacks, and a bustling flea market.

goa.name: Dudhsagar Waterfalls
goa.description: Dudhsagar Waterfalls, situated on the Mandovi River, is a spectacular four-tiered cascade surrounded by lush greenery. Its milky white appearance gives it the name 'Sea of Milk.'
goa.address: Dudhsagar Waterfalls, Sonaulim, South Goa, Goa, 403410

nainital.name: Naini Lake
nainital.description: Naini Lake, the centerpiece of Nainital, is a serene and scenic freshwater lake. It offers boating opportunities, surrounded by hills and vibrant markets, making it the heart of the town.

nainital.name: Naina Devi Temple
nainital.description: Naina Devi Temple, perched on the northern shore of Naini Lake, is a revered Hindu shrine dedicated to Goddess Naina Devi. It offers spiritual solace and panoramic views of the lake.
